channel.title: ux on Steam - a minimal theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in ux on Steam - a minimal theme for Hugo

item.title: What to do? An android app made to guide people what to do in various scenarios.
item.description: Click Here to download _NOTE : _This app has been signed with default debug key We all face various scenarios in our life . Some are life threatening while some are just awkward moments . In each case it is kinda vital to do the write things at the write time . This app has been made to help you do the same with the help researched content and quick links provided within the app.
